scripts.preinstall: node -e "if (parseInt(process.version.slice(1)) < 22) { console.error('❌ Node.js 22+ required. Run: nvm use 22'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.predev: node -e "if (parseInt(process.version.slice(1)) < 22) { console.error('❌ Node.js 22+ required. Run: nvm use 22'); process.exit(1); }"
scripts.prebuild: node -e "if (parseInt(process.version.slice(1)) < 22) { console.error('❌ Node.js 22+ required. Run: nvm use 22'); process.exit(1); }"
